data.text:
A while later. I wanted to hear Agnes Digital out some more, so 
I went to look for her.
data.processed:
<story>A while later. I wanted to hear Agnes Digital out some more, so 
<story>I went to look for her.

data.text:
...You there. What are you up to, looking all shifty? 
Are you perhaps, perish the thought, stalking Umamusume, in 
broad daylight?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>...You there. What are you up to, looking all shifty? 
<story>Are you perhaps, perish the thought, stalking Umamusume, in 
<story>broad daylight?

data.text:
Ahahaha! I kid, I kid. That'd make you a dead ringer for the 
"Umamusume-chan-loving trainer" Digital-kun's been talking 
about.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaha! I kid, I kid. That'd make you a dead ringer for the 
<story>"Umamusume-chan-loving trainer" Digital-kun's been talking 
<story>about.

data.text: Oh, dear, it really is you? Well, well...
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed: Oh, dear, it really is you? Well, well...

data.text:
If you're looking for Digital-kun, she's out right now. En route to 
the train station, by the look of it. I'd wager she's on the hunt for 
more Umamusume merch, as usual――
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>If you're looking for Digital-kun, she's out right now. En route to 
<story>the train station, by the look of it. I'd wager she's on the hunt for 
<story>more Umamusume merch, as usual――

data.text:
...Hmm, a trainer seeking out Digital-kun, eh? 
Will she able to keep someone like that at arm's length? 
Fufu, how fascinating.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>...Hmm, a trainer seeking out Digital-kun, eh? 
<story>Will she able to keep someone like that at arm's length? 
<story>Fufu, how fascinating.

data.text:
Following Agnes Tachyon's advice, I kept looking for Digital. And 
then――
data.processed:
<story>Following Agnes Tachyon's advice, I kept looking for Digital. And 
<story>then――

data.text: Ahh~...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Ahh~...

data.text:
Oh, legs gliding upon verdant grass, full of elegance and grace... 
Oh, legs pushing with force upon the earth, full of vim and vigor...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Oh, legs gliding upon verdant grass, full of elegance and grace... 
<story>Oh, legs pushing with force upon the earth, full of vim and vigor...

data.text:
Which prints do I buy? ――A foolish question! 
I'm getting both, obviously!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Which prints do I buy? ――A foolish question! 
<story>I'm getting both, obviously!

data.text:
Ahhh, thou who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name! 
For granting me life in a world blessed with so many goddesses!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Ahhh, thou who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name! 
<story>For granting me life in a world blessed with so many goddesses!

data.text: Yes―― I, Digitan, devote my youth to you, Umamusume-chans! I was wrong to even think about running with them!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Yes―― I, Digitan, devote my youth to you, Umamusume-chans! I was wrong to even think about running with them!

data.text: Uh, whaddya want...? Whom...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Uh, whaddya want...? Whom...?

data.text: Bwah...!? I- Th...!? Sori, but, did, yoo, purhaps, here, every, thing, eye, sed...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Bwah...!? I- Th...!? Sori, but, did, yoo, purhaps, here, every, thing, eye, sed...?

data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Óh......

data.text: Well, you already overhead all that――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Well, you already overhead all that――

data.text:
But this is seriously the biggest of the biggest of big questions! 
Just think about it! Who am I!? That's RIGHT――!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>But this is seriously the biggest of the biggest of big questions! 
<story>Just think about it! Who am I!? That's RIGHT――!

data.text:
――I am AGNES DIGITAL! The Umamusume who loves 
Umamusume-chans more than any other!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>――I am AGNES DIGITAL! The Umamusume who loves 
<story>Umamusume-chans more than any other!

data.text: Do you really think I can just choose between turf Umamusume-chans and dirt Umamusume-chans?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Do you really think I can just choose between turf Umamusume-chans and dirt Umamusume-chans?

data.text:
No way, no way, no freaking way!! It's just as impossible as 
playing the mandolin without a pick!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: And that's why you won't run yourself?
choices.processed: <size=42>And that's why you won't run yourself?</size>

data.processed:
<story>No way, no way, no freaking way!! It's just as impossible as 
<story>playing the mandolin without a pick!!

data.text: Exaaactly. The perfect place for me is quietly revering my faves behind the monitor...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Exaaactly. The perfect place for me is quietly revering my faves behind the monitor...

data.text:
Ahh... On that fateful day of my childhood, watching those 
Umamusume-chans on TV, just how moved I was... 
How could I ever forget...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Ahh... On that fateful day of my childhood, watching those 
<story>Umamusume-chans on TV, just how moved I was... 
<story>How could I ever forget...

data.text:
Seeing the Umamusume-chans clash, each with her own feelings 
in tow... It wasn't just their brilliance that moved me...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Seeing the Umamusume-chans clash, each with her own feelings 
<story>in tow... It wasn't just their brilliance that moved me...

data.text:
It was their "will"...! 
Their will made me think they were just so precious.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>It was their "will"...! 
<story>Their will made me think they were just so precious.

data.text: I was blessed enough to be born an Umamusume, too. ――And an Umamusume has to run!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: I was blessed enough to be born an Umamusume, too. ――And an Umamusume has to run!

data.text:
The race is the ultimate stage for Umamusume-chans to shine! 
And I wanted to see every last one of them shine as bright as 
they can! I wanted to support them with everything I had!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>The race is the ultimate stage for Umamusume-chans to shine! 
<story>And I wanted to see every last one of them shine as bright as 
<story>they can! I wanted to support them with everything I had!

data.text:
Even though choosing would force me to miss some of them. 
Even then...! 
...I steeled my will, I guess.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Even though choosing would force me to miss some of them. 
<story>Even then...! 
<story>...I steeled my will, I guess.

data.text:
I enrolled at Tracen Academy. 
But when I took just one step on school grounds――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I enrolled at Tracen Academy. 
<story>But when I took just one step on school grounds――

data.text:
Hee hee hee, hoo hoo hoo... 
Ahh, the air is brimming with Umamusume-chans' lovely 
laughter...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Hee hee hee, hoo hoo hoo... 
<story>Ahh, the air is brimming with Umamusume-chans' lovely 
<story>laughter...

data.text:
My faves are here, flesh and blood! They're real... They're 3D... 
Their breathing, their heartbeats, their footsteps, I can hear them 
all up close!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>My faves are here, flesh and blood! They're real... They're 3D... 
<story>Their breathing, their heartbeats, their footsteps, I can hear them 
<story>all up close!

data.text:
Ahhh, these aren't just pictures on a screen! 
They're the real Umamusume-chans of Tracen Academy... 
...When that realization hit me――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Ahhh, these aren't just pictures on a screen! 
<story>They're the real Umamusume-chans of Tracen Academy... 
<story>...When that realization hit me――

data.text: ――Oh, it blew my freaking mind!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: ――Oh, it blew my freaking mind!!!

data.text: "I steeled my will"!? Are you kidding? My flimsy will wasn't worth squat!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: "I steeled my will"!? Are you kidding? My flimsy will wasn't worth squat!!

data.text: Not when I got to see all my beloved Umamusume-chans in IRL HD...!! And to top it all off, I find out I've got the goods for both track types?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Not when I got to see all my beloved Umamusume-chans in IRL HD...!! And to top it all off, I find out I've got the goods for both track types?

data.text:
There's just no way!! How the heck am I supposed to choose 
between turf and dirt?!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>There's just no way!! How the heck am I supposed to choose 
<story>between turf and dirt?!!!!

data.text: ...Nay, the truest choice is not to choose at all!!! That is the way of the fan!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: ...Nay, the truest choice is not to choose at all!!! That is the way of the fan!!!

data.text: So I'm not going to choose!! I'm not going to run on EITHER track!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: So I'm not going to choose!! I'm not going to run on EITHER track!!!!

data.text:
She put it all out in the open. 
You could say she had nothing to hide. But――
data.processed:
<story>She put it all out in the open. 
<story>You could say she had nothing to hide. But――

data.text:
So, what about you? Do you think you've got time to waste on 
little old me? Shouldn't you go give your attention to those other 
Umamusume-chans?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: (There's another way of looking at this...)
choices.processed: <size=40>(There's another way of looking at this...)</size>

data.processed:
<story>So, what about you? Do you think you've got time to waste on 
<story>little old me? Shouldn't you go give your attention to those other 
<story>Umamusume-chans?

data.text:
Fu fu fu. Don't have a comeback, now do you? 
Well, then, I'll be off――
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: ――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!
choices.processed: <size=34>――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!</size>

choices.text: ――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!
choices.processed: <size=34>――You've got a stronger will than anyone else!</size>

data.processed:
<story>Fu fu fu. Don't have a comeback, now do you? 
<story>Well, then, I'll be off――

data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>......What?

data.text:
...Uh, were you, perchance, not listening to what I said? 
I didn't even have the will to make that choice, you know?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: No, you had the will to not make that choice!
choices.processed: No, you had the will to not make that choice!

choices.text: No, you had the will to not make that choice!
choices.processed: No, you had the will to not make that choice!

data.processed:
<story>...Uh, were you, perchance, not listening to what I said? 
<story>I didn't even have the will to make that choice, you know?

data.text: Bwuh...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Bwuh...?

data.text:
I remembered―― Despite her small size, she showed tremendous 
strength on the dirt track.
data.processed:
<story>I remembered―― Despite her small size, she showed tremendous 
<story>strength on the dirt track.

data.text:
And she ran nimbly across the turf, with just as much skill as she 
did on dirt.
data.processed:
<story>And she ran nimbly across the turf, with just as much skill as she 
<story>did on dirt.

data.text:
She couldn't choose between them, so she gave it her all on 
both. So why not use that to her advantage!?――
data.processed:
<story>She couldn't choose between them, so she gave it her all on 
<story>both. So why not use that to her advantage!?――

data.text:
Ummmm... 
I, um, beg your pardon, but I understand not what you are saying 
here...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Ummmm... 
<story>I, um, beg your pardon, but I understand not what you are saying 
<story>here...

data.text:
I explained my idea to her right away. 
Then――
data.processed:
<story>I explained my idea to her right away. 
<story>Then――

data.text: BWGHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!!!!!???
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: BWGHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!!!!!???

data.text:
――A few days later. 
Word started to get around about a certain something.
data.processed:
<story>――A few days later. 
<story>Word started to get around about a certain something.

data.text: Hey, d'you hear? The thing with Digital...!
data.name: Vodka
data.processed: <story>Hey, d'you hear? The thing with Digital...!

data.text:
I heard! But I still can't believe it. 
It really came out of nowhere...
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
<story>I heard! But I still can't believe it. 
<story>It really came out of nowhere...

data.text: I can't believe she registered for the both the turf and dirt Selection Races...!
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed: I can't believe she registered for the both the turf and dirt Selection Races...!
